DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effectiveness newer atypical antipsychotic versus old conventional antipsychotic treat schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Atypical Versus Conventional Antipsychotics Treating Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: At seven participate hospital , acutely exacerbated patient schizophrenia randomly assign treatment antipsychotic atypical class v antipsychotic conventional class . Medication choice within class , dose , concomitant medication , prescribe decision leave community prescriber . Patients follow one year discharge .
